title: Everytime I try to play a game I get through the loading Screen and the game freezes
body: This has been happening for awhile. Every time I go into a game get as far as getting into the actual game then computer completely freezes. There is a buzzing noise playing through my head set and have to restart the computer and it doesn't give me the option to rejoin the game when I relaunch the game. Please help????/

replies.body:
I have a hunch that this is the *Game DVR* feature inside the Windows Game Bar that's causing this. A recent Windows 10 update enabled this feature and has been causing these freezes. I suggest disabling the Windows Game Bar by following [this guide.](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html)

Let me know if those steps helped.
